statement:
cdlemg12.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.

cdlemg12.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.

cdlemg18b.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdlemg18c $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ F e. T ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ ( F ` P ) =/= Q /\ ( ( F ` Q ) .\/ ( F ` P ) ) =/= ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ ( F ` Q ) ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( F ` P ) ) ) e. A ) $.
